comments.author: @RyanShakes
comments.text: To the people that's reading this comment, chances are you are "excited" after watching this video. But here's the deal this "excitement" that you have ISN'T GOING TO DO ONE SINGLE THING FOR YOU!!! Here's the deal you see this motivation, it is just a feeling. Grounded action is what gets things done. Look guys motivation gets you going, but DISCIPLINE, strong habits gets things done. Motivation you feel good and your like WOOOOWWW I feel good, but when it is time to bring it into practice you cannot rely on it. Here's my invitation for you guys what I want you to do is to get a pen pad or paper or whatever the case maybe in the write down one or two things that you are going to commit to doing every single day no matter what. And I hope that helps you guys, GOOD LUCK!
